somnambulantmod: Trauma.NAME: Trauma
somnambulantmod: Trauma.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Shuffle a Nightmare into your draw pile.

somnambulantmod: OpeningUp.NAME: Opening Up
somnambulantmod: OpeningUp.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Whenever you draw this card, shuffle a Nightmare into your draw pile.

somnambulantmod: Bruise.NAME: Bruise
somnambulantmod: Bruise.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies.

somnambulantmod: PourItOut.NAME: Pour It Out
somnambulantmod: PourItOut.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage for each card played this turn.
somnambulantmod: PourItOut.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: NL Deal !D! damage for each card played this turn.

somnambulantmod: NightmareFuel.NAME: Nightmare Fuel
somnambulantmod: NightmareFuel.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies X times. NL Shuffle X Nightmares into your draw pile.

somnambulantmod: RecurringDream.NAME: Recurring Dream
somnambulantmod: RecurringDream.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Shuffle a copy of this card into your draw pile. NL Add a Dazed to your hand. Exhaust.

somnambulantmod: ViralIdea.NAME: Viral Idea
somnambulantmod: ViralIdea.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw this card, add 2 copies of it to your hand. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

somnambulantmod: RacingThoughts.NAME: Racing Thoughts
somnambulantmod: RacingThoughts.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Whenever you draw this card, increase its damage by !M!.

somnambulantmod: Repression.NAME: Repression
somnambulantmod: Repression.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. NL Discard !M! card from your draw pile.
somnambulantmod: Repression.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. NL Discard !M! cards from your draw pile.

somnambulantmod: Remember.NAME: Remember
somnambulantmod: Remember.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Put a card from your exhaust pile on top of your draw pile. NL Exhaust.
somnambulantmod: Remember.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Put a card from your exhaust pile on top of your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

somnambulantmod: HorrificThought.NAME: Horrific Thought
somnambulantmod: HorrificThought.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Shuffle 2 Nightmares into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.
somnambulantmod: HorrificThought.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Shuffle 2 Nightmares into your draw pile.

somnambulantmod: TimeCompression.NAME: Time Compression
somnambulantmod: TimeCompression.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain [G] for each Nightmare in your hand. NL Exhaust.
somnambulantmod: TimeCompression.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain [G] for each Nightmare in your hand.

somnambulantmod: HappyThoughts.NAME: Happy Thoughts
somnambulantmod: HappyThoughts.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak. NL Discard a card.
somnambulantmod: HappyThoughts.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak. NL Discard a card.

somnambulantmod: BrainFeeder.NAME: Brain Feeder
somnambulantmod: BrainFeeder.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. NL Whenever you are attacked this turn, add !M! Dream to your discard pile.
somnambulantmod: BrainFeeder.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. NL Whenever you are attacked this turn, add !M! Dream to your discard pile.

somnambulantmod: Nightmare.NAME: Nightmare
somnambulantmod: Nightmare.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Apply !M! Poison. NL Exhaust.

somnambulantmod: TrepanningBlow.NAME: Trepanning Blow
somnambulantmod: TrepanningBlow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust a card in your hand.

somnambulantmod: Dream.NAME: Dream
somnambulantmod: Dream.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Fill your hand with random cards. NL They cost 0 this turn.
somnambulantmod: Dream.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Fill your hand with random cards. NL They cost 0 this turn.

somnambulantmod: Relive.NAME: Relive
somnambulantmod: Relive.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle !M! copies into your draw pile of the next card you play this turn. NL Shuffle a Nightmare into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.
somnambulantmod: Relive.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Shuffle !M! copies into your draw pile of the next card you play this turn. NL Shuffle a Nightmare into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

somnambulantmod: QuickNap.NAME: Quick Nap
somnambulantmod: QuickNap.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! card. NL Add a Dream to your discard pile, and shuffle a Nightmare into your draw pile.
somnambulantmod: QuickNap.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Add a Dream to your discard pile, and shuffle a Nightmare into your draw pile.

somnambulantmod: UnthoughtKnown.NAME: Unthought Known
somnambulantmod: UnthoughtKnown.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Whenevever you exhaust this card, permanently increase its damage by !M!.

somnambulantmod: Reinterpret.NAME: Reinterpret
somnambulantmod: Reinterpret.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Upgrade ALL cards in your hand. NL Exhaust.
somnambulantmod: Reinterpret.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Upgrade ALL cards in your hand.

somnambulantmod: Stimulus.NAME: Stimulus
somnambulantmod: Stimulus.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the target is attacking, add a Nightmare to your draw pile.
somnambulantmod: Stimulus.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the target is attacking, add a Nightmare to your draw pile and a Dream to your discard pile.

somnambulantmod: DarkeningMind.NAME: Darkening Mind
somnambulantmod: DarkeningMind.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a Nightmare, gain !M! Strength.

somnambulantmod: DeeperSleep.NAME: Deeper Sleep
somnambulantmod: DeeperSleep.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a Dream, gain !M! Dexterity.
somnambulantmod: DeeperSleep.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a Dream to your discard pile. Whenever you draw a Dream, gain !M! Dexterity.

somnambulantmod: Refracture.NAME: Refracture
somnambulantmod: Refracture.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you exhaust a card, deal !M! damage to a random enemy.

somnambulantmod: RuthlessStudy.NAME: Ruthless Study
somnambulantmod: RuthlessStudy.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a card this turn, gain !M! Mental Barrier.
somnambulantmod: RuthlessStudy.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a card this turn, gain !M! Mental Barrier.

somnambulantmod: MindWave.NAME: Mind Wave
somnambulantmod: MindWave.DESCRIPTION: Gain block equal to the number of cards in hand. NL Deal !D! damage.

somnambulantmod: Amnausea.NAME: Amnausea
somnambulantmod: Amnausea.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust ALL cards in your hand. NL Apply !M! Poison to ALL enemies for each Exhausted card. NL Exhaust.

somnambulantmod: NewDawn.NAME: New Dawn
somnambulantmod: NewDawn.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Exhaust your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

somnambulantmod: LeechFears.NAME: Leech Fears
somnambulantmod: LeechFears.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies and draw 2 cards.

somnambulantmod: BadIdea.NAME: Bad Idea
somnambulantmod: BadIdea.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL If you have a Nightmare in hand, also apply !M! Poison.

somnambulantmod: Externalize.NAME: Externalize
somnambulantmod: Externalize.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card from your hand. Apply Poison equal to its cost.
somnambulantmod: Externalize.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card from your hand. Apply Poison equal to its cost + 1.

somnambulantmod: Nosebleed.NAME: Nosebleed
somnambulantmod: Nosebleed.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Poison and draw a card.

somnambulantmod: Damping.NAME: Damping
somnambulantmod: Damping.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL All enemies lose !M! Strength. NL Gain !M! Dexterity.

somnambulantmod: Overshare.NAME: Overshare
somnambulantmod: Overshare.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Poison to a random enemy. NL Repeat for each Nightmare in your hand.

somnambulantmod: Extract.NAME: Extract
somnambulantmod: Extract.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Poison X times. NL Draw a card. NL Exhaust.
somnambulantmod: Extract.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Poison X times. NL Draw X cards. NL Exhaust.

somnambulantmod: Inspiration.NAME: Inspiration
somnambulantmod: Inspiration.DESCRIPTION: Gain [G]  and draw a card for each Nightmare in your hand. Exhaust.
somnambulantmod: Inspiration.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain [G]  and draw a card for each Nightmare in your hand.

somnambulantmod: LayeredDefense.NAME: Layered Defense
somnambulantmod: LayeredDefense.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw this card, add a copy of it to your hand. NL Gain !M! Mental Barrier. NL Exhaust.
somnambulantmod: LayeredDefense.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw this card, add a copy of it to your hand. NL Gain !M! Mental Barrier. NL Exhaust.

somnambulantmod: Hush.NAME: Hush
somnambulantmod: Hush.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw this card, exhaust it and draw 2 cards. NL At the start of your turn, shuffle !M! Hush into your draw pile.
somnambulantmod: Hush.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw this card, exhaust it and draw !M! cards. NL At the start of your turn, shuffle 1 Hush into your draw pile.
somnambulantmod: Hush.OLD_UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw this card, add a copy NL of it to your hand. NL Gain !B! block. NL Exhaust.

somnambulantmod: ShowerThought.NAME: Shower Thought
somnambulantmod: ShowerThought.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to your Block. NL Gain !B! block.

somnambulantmod: Cower.NAME: Cower
somnambulantmod: Cower.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. NL Apply !M! Weak to yourself.

somnambulantmod: PillowFort.NAME: Pillow Fort
somnambulantmod: PillowFort.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Gain !B! block. NL Add !M! copies of this card into your discard pile.

somnambulantmod: SnuggleUp.NAME: Snuggle Up
somnambulantmod: SnuggleUp.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. NL Whenever you draw this card, gain !M! block.

somnambulantmod: InLimbo.NAME: In Limbo
somnambulantmod: InLimbo.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play your fourth card in a turn, add your discard pile to the top of your draw pile in random order.

somnambulantmod: SharpeningMind.NAME: Sharpening Mind
somnambulantmod: SharpeningMind.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you are attacked, deal !M! damage back. NL Whenever you draw this card, increase this value by 3.
somnambulantmod: SharpeningMind.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you are attacked, deal !M! damage back. NL Whenever you draw this card, increase this value by 5.

somnambulantmod: Bloom.NAME: Bloom
somnambulantmod: Bloom.DESCRIPTION: Discard the top !M! cards from your draw pile. NL Put a card from your discard pile into your hand.
somnambulantmod: Bloom.OLD_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! card. NL Put a card from your discard pile on top of your draw pile.

somnambulantmod: HeavyLids.NAME: Heavy Lids
somnambulantmod: HeavyLids.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. NL This costs 0 if you have a Dream in hand.

somnambulantmod: Harden.NAME: Harden
somnambulantmod: Harden.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! card. NL Gain block equal to the number of cards in your hand.
somnambulantmod: Harden.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Gain block equal to the number of cards in your hand.

somnambulantmod: SleepingBody.NAME: Sleeping Body
somnambulantmod: SleepingBody.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a Dream or Nightmare, gain !M! Block.

somnambulantmod: NightHaunts.NAME: Night Haunts
somnambulantmod: NightHaunts.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Whenever you exhaust a card this turn, apply !M! poison. NL Exhaust.

somnambulantmod: Ignorance.NAME: Ignorance
somnambulantmod: Ignorance.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you exhaust a card this turn, NL gain [G]. NL You cannot draw additional cards this turn. NL Exhaust.

somnambulantmod: Reject.NAME: Reject
somnambulantmod: Reject.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Exhaust ALL Nightmares in your hand. Gain !B! block for each card exhausted this way. NL Exhaust.
somnambulantmod: Reject.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Exhaust ALL Nightmares in your hand. Gain !B! block for each card exhausted this way.

somnambulantmod: Unburden.NAME: Unburden
somnambulantmod: Unburden.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust ALL Nightmares in your hand. Gain 1 Dexterity for each Nightmare exhausted.
somnambulantmod: Unburden.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Exhaust ALL Nightmares in your hand. Gain 1 Dexterity for each Nightmare exhausted.
somnambulantmod: Unburden.OLD_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust ALL Nightmares in your hand and create that many random attacks. They cost 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.
somnambulantmod: Unburden.OLD_UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Exhaust ALL Nightmares in your hand and create that many random attacks. They cost 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.

somnambulantmod: Unknow.NAME: Unknow
somnambulantmod: Unknow.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. Discard !M! cards at random.

somnambulantmod: AllForNothing.NAME: All For Nothing
somnambulantmod: AllForNothing.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Exhaust your hand. NL Exhaust.
somnambulantmod: AllForNothing.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. Exhaust your hand, then draw a card. NL Exhaust.

somnambulantmod: Narcolepsy.NAME: Narcolepsy
somnambulantmod: Narcolepsy.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Stun an enemy. Add !M! Nightmares to your draw pile. NL Exhaust.
somnambulantmod: Narcolepsy.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Stun an enemy. Add !M! Nightmares to your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

somnambulantmod: Blink.NAME: Blink
somnambulantmod: Blink.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Add !M! Dream to your discard pile.
somnambulantmod: Blink.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Add !M! Dreams to your discard pile.

somnambulantmod: Withdraw.NAME: Withdraw
somnambulantmod: Withdraw.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Mental Barrier. Whenever you draw this card, draw a card.  NL Exhaust.
somnambulantmod: Withdraw.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Mental Barrier X times. Whenever you draw this card, draw a card.

somnambulantmod: SickeningSwathe.NAME: Sickening Swathe
somnambulantmod: SickeningSwathe.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Poison to ALL enemies. NL Shuffle a Nightmare into your draw pile.

somnambulantmod: Lucidity.NAME: Lucidity
somnambulantmod: Lucidity.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, add !M! Dream to your discard pile. All cards exhaust when played.

somnambulantmod: Overcome.NAME: Overcome
somnambulantmod: Overcome.DESCRIPTION: Heal !M! HP. NL Discard ALL Nightmares from your hand. NL Exhaust.
somnambulantmod: Overcome.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Heal !M! HP. NL Exhaust ALL Nightmares from your hand. NL Exhaust.

somnambulantmod: DreamBig.NAME: Dream Big
somnambulantmod: DreamBig.DESCRIPTION: Add X Dreams to your discard pile. NL Exhaust.
somnambulantmod: DreamBig.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add X Dreams to your discard pile 2 times. NL Exhaust.

somnambulantmod: MuscleMemory.NAME: Muscle Memory
somnambulantmod: MuscleMemory.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. Exhaust a card in your hand. Gain !M! Strength.

somnambulantmod: SleepParalysis.NAME: Sleep Paralysis
somnambulantmod: SleepParalysis.DESCRIPTION: Add a Dream and Nightmare to your hand. Apply !M! Vulnerable to yourself. NL Exhaust.
somnambulantmod: SleepParalysis.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add an upgraded Dream and Nightmare to your hand. Apply !M! Vulnerable to yourself. NL Exhaust.

somnambulantmod: Wake.NAME: Wake
somnambulantmod: Wake.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust ALL Nightmares and Dreams from your hand and draw pile. Draw a card for each card exhausted. NL Exhaust.
somnambulantmod: Wake.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust ALL Nightmares from your hand and draw pile. Draw a card for each card exhausted. NL Exhaust.

somnambulantmod: Unmake.NAME: Unmake
somnambulantmod: Unmake.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Add your discard pile to the top of your draw pile in random order.

somnambulantmod: LightSleeper.NAME: Light Sleeper
somnambulantmod: LightSleeper.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Dreams and Nightmares cost 1 less. NL Add a Dream to your discard pile.

somnambulantmod: GnarledSwing.NAME: Gnarled Swing
somnambulantmod: GnarledSwing.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL This costs 1 if you have a Nightmare in hand.

somnambulantmod: MaterializedGlimpse.NAME: Materialized Glimpse
somnambulantmod: MaterializedGlimpse.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy. NL Repeat for each Nightmare in your hand.

somnambulantmod: LostMind.NAME: Lost Mind
somnambulantmod: LostMind.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain [G] and add a Nightmare to your draw pile.

somnambulantmod: LoseForm.NAME: Lose Form
somnambulantmod: LoseForm.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a random card from your discard pile and exhaust it.
somnambulantmod: LoseForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a card from your discard pile and exhaust it.

somnambulantmod: ShimmeringVeil.NAME: Shimmering Veil
somnambulantmod: ShimmeringVeil.DESCRIPTION: Block is not removed at the start of your next !M! turns.

somnambulantmod: ImpenetrableMind.NAME: Impenetrable Mind
somnambulantmod: ImpenetrableMind.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Whenever you draw a card, gain !M! block.

somnambulantmod: Mindlessness.NAME: Mindlessness
somnambulantmod: Mindlessness.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you exhaust a card, add a random attack to your hand.

somnambulantmod: GalaxyBrain.NAME: Galaxy Brain
somnambulantmod: GalaxyBrain.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a Dream, exhaust ALL cards in your hand.

somnambulantmod: PrimingPunch.NAME: Priming Punch
somnambulantmod: PrimingPunch.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Upgrade a random card in your hand.
somnambulantmod: PrimingPunch.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Upgrade a card in your hand.
